Dreadplague arrives near to the Black Fortress and shrieks to 
announce herself.

Dreadplague: Predacons! I am sent by Major Tyrael of the Tripredacus 
Strikers. I am Dreadplague and I need to take one of you with me. All 
our lives depend on it.
